series.subject: Welcome to Venus One — Your Cosmic Journey Begins
series.preview_text: The stars have been waiting for you...

body.headline: Welcome to Venus One
paragraphs: Welcome to your new cosmic companion. We're so glad you're here.
Venus One is more than just a horoscope app — it's your personal guide to understanding yourself, your relationships, and your place in the universe.
Your birth chart has already been calculated using the exact moment and place you were born. It's a unique cosmic fingerprint that no one else shares.
body.closing: The stars are ready when you are.

series.subject: Your Birth Chart Is Ready to Explore

body.headline: Understanding Your Birth Chart
paragraphs: Your birth chart is like a snapshot of the sky at the exact moment you were born. It shows where all the planets were positioned and what that means for your personality, strengths, and life path.
Here's what you'll discover:

• Your Sun sign — your core identity and ego
• Your Moon sign — your emotional nature and inner self
• Your Rising sign — how others perceive you
• Your planetary placements — deeper layers of who you are
Take a few minutes today to explore your chart. You might be surprised by what resonates.

series.subject: Why Your Readings Are Unique to You
series.preview_text: This isn't generic Sun sign content...

body.headline: Personalized Insights, Just for You
paragraphs: You might be wondering: how is Venus One different from other horoscope apps?
Most apps only look at your Sun sign. That's just 1/10th of your chart. We analyze all 10 planets, 12 houses, and the aspects between them — giving you readings that are truly personal.
That's why your daily horoscope might feel different from what your friends see, even if you share the same Sun sign. Your Moon, Rising, Mercury, Venus, and Mars signs all play a role.
The more accurately you entered your birth time, the more precise your chart becomes. If you're not sure about your exact birth time, check your birth certificate or ask a family member.
body.closing: Your stars are as unique as you are.

series.subject: Your Daily Cosmic Ritual
series.preview_text: Start each day with cosmic guidance...

body.headline: Make Astrology Part of Your Morning
paragraphs: Many of our users have found that checking their horoscope each morning helps them start the day with clarity and intention.
It only takes a minute, but it can set the tone for how you approach your day — what to be mindful of, where to focus your energy, and how to make the most of cosmic support.
Want to make it a habit? Enable daily notifications and we'll send you a gentle reminder each morning.

tip.headline: Pro tip:
tip.text: Check both your Sun and Rising sign horoscopes for a more complete picture.

body.closing: Start tomorrow morning with the stars.

series.subject: What Have the Stars Revealed So Far?

body.headline: One Week of Cosmic Guidance
paragraphs: It's been a week since you joined Venus One. We hope you've discovered something meaningful about yourself and your cosmic blueprint.
Here are some features you might want to explore next:

• Compatibility — see how your chart aligns with someone else's
• Tarot — pull a daily card for guidance
• Transits — track how current planetary movements affect you
• Numerology — discover your life path number
Remember: your birth chart doesn't change, but the planets are always moving. That's why daily check-ins can reveal new insights.
body.closing: Your cosmic journey is just beginning.

premium_welcome.subject: Welcome to Premium — Your Full Cosmic Toolkit
premium_welcome.preview_text: Unlimited readings and deeper insights await...

body.headline: Welcome to Venus One Premium
paragraphs: Thank you for upgrading to Premium. You now have access to the full Venus One experience — no limits, no ads, just pure cosmic guidance.
Here's what you've unlocked:

• Unlimited daily, weekly, and monthly horoscopes
• Deep planet and aspect readings
• Synastry and composite chart analysis
• Transit alerts and calendar
• Premium tarot sessions
• Priority support
Explore everything at your own pace. The stars aren't going anywhere.
body.closing: Thank you for trusting us with your cosmic journey.
